channel.title: Networks on Aniruddha Deb
channel.description: Recent content in Networks on Aniruddha Deb

item.title: Installing ns3: What worked
item.description: Prerequisites XCode CLT (which you should have) QT 5. Install via brew install qt5. NOTE: if you already have an updated version of Qt, you’ll need to pass a different qmake, and brew won’t link this to your system. Brew will inform you of this, and you’ll manually need to pass the path to qmake while building. More on this later. Python ? PyBindGen - I installed this via pip install pybindgen, but waf didn’t pick it up.
